Agribusiness.1: Exhibit the general outcomes of the College of Business in terms of intellectual depth and breadth, communication skills, critical thinking skills, business environment knowledge and skills, and ethics.
Agribusiness.2: Write a professional marketing plan in an agribusiness context.
Agribusiness.3: Identify consumer needs and growth opportunities in global agribusiness markets.
Agribusiness.4: Generate and justify agribusiness marketing programs in such marketplaces and measure their success or failure.
Agribusiness.5: Communicate, negotiate, and deal effectively in agribusiness marketing channels.
Agribusiness.6: Develop and understand information and analysis in agribusiness markets.
